import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create location"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new location within the current site. The location will be associated with the site specified in the request headers.

**Required Fields:**
- `Name` - Display name for the location
- `LocationTypeId` - Reference to a valid location type

**Address Handling:** If address fields (Street1, City, State, Zip) are provided, an address record will be automatically created and linked to the location.

**Custom Fields:** To set custom field values during creation, set `UpdateCustomFields: true` and include the `CustomFieldValues` array.

**Workflow:**
1. Obtain a valid `LocationTypeId` from location type endpoints
2. Optionally obtain a `LocationStatusTypeId` for the initial status
3. Call this endpoint with required fields
4. Use the returned `LocationId` for subsequent operations

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication","example":"Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context - the location will be created in this site","example":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e"},{"name":"ProductId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Product context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a location. When creating, Name and LocationTypeId are required. When updating, only include fields you want to change.","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Location display name","example":"IncidentIQ Demo High School"},"Abbreviation":{"type":"string","description":"Short code or abbreviation for the location","example":"IIDHS"},"LocationTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the location type. Obtain available types from location type endpoints.","example":"16469164-bce0-42b1-be1c-49861087c499"},"LocationStatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the location status type (e.g., Active, Inactive)","example":"68f6543f-09a1-ec11-8619-f8e43b468024"},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Detailed description of the location","example":"Main high school facility serving grades 9-12"},"Notes":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Internal notes about the location (not visible to end users)","example":"Building renovated in 2023"},"IsReservable":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether rooms at this location can be reserved for events","default":false},"Street1":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary street address line. Setting this will create/update the location's address.","example":"100 Demo Street"},"Street2":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Secondary address line (suite, building, etc.)","example":"Building A"},"City":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"City name","example":"Atlanta"},"State":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"State or province code","example":"GA"},"Zip":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Postal/ZIP code","example":"30317"},"LogoId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Reference to an uploaded logo file for this location"},"FloorplanId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Reference to the primary floorplan file for this location"},"IsDuplicateRequest":{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"Set to true when intentionally creating a location with a name that may already exist"},"UpdateCustomFields":{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"Set to true to update custom field values included in this request"},"CustomFieldValues":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Custom field value specific to a location","properties":{"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the location. Obtain via [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-v-2), extract `Items[].LocationId`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getMyLocationsV2","endpoint":"GET /api/v2.0/locations","responseField":"Items[].LocationId"}},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the custom field type definition"},"EditorTypeId":{"type":"integer","description":"Editor type for rendering the field (text, dropdown, date, etc.)"},"Value":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The custom field value as a JSON string"},"IsHidden":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this field is hidden from standard views"},"MappedProperties":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true,"nullable":true,"description":"Additional mapped properties for complex field types"}},"required":["CustomFieldTypeId"],"title":"LocationCustomFieldValue"},"description":"Custom field values to set. Only processed if UpdateCustomFields is true."}},"required":["Name","LocationTypeId"],"title":"UpdateLocationRequest"},"example":{"Name":"IncidentIQ Demo Elementary School","Abbreviation":"IIDES","LocationTypeId":"16469164-bce0-42b1-be1c-49861087c499","LocationStatusTypeId":"68f6543f-09a1-ec11-8619-f8e43b468024","Description":"Elementary school serving grades K-5","IsReservable":true,"Street1":"200 Demo Avenue","City":"Atlanta","State":"GA","Zip":"30318"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
